Package com.intellij.openapi.editor.ex.util

Class SegmentArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.editor.ex.util.SegmentArray
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SegmentArrayWithData

    public class SegmentArray
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a data structure specialized for working with the indexed segments, i.e. it holds numerous mappings like 'index <-> (start; end)' and provides convenient way for working with them, e.g. find index by particular offset that belongs to target (start; end) segment etc.

    Not thread-safe.
